title: Regression in a previous life/ Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
In today's video Dr. Marco Paret's students will induce a regression in a previous life with the technique Fascination - the power of the gaze/ the eye, which in the ancient traditions symbolizes protection and wisdom. The subject experienced a regression in past life on a boat and saw himself dying violently in the waves, but then understood that we come back and it is not the end. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Check out some other videos with our students  on our channel:
